# Cypress Capabilities Demo - Repository Guide

[![OWASP Top 10](https://img.shields.io/badge/Security-OWASP%20Top%2010-blue.svg)](https://owasp.org/www-project-top-ten/)

This repository contains the Cypress Capabilities Demo, a comprehensive test suite demonstrating advanced Cypress features and security best practices.

## ğŸ“ Key Directories

- `cypress/`: Main Cypress test suite and test application.
- `docs/`: [Project Documentation](../docs/README.md).
- `scripts/`: Helper scripts for maintenance and security audits.

## ğŸ›¡ï¸ Security

We adhere to **OWASP Top 10** security standards.
- Run security audits: `npm run security:audit` (see `scripts/`)
- View security policy: [copilot-instructions.md](copilot-instructions.md)
